smartphone.text: To configure a smartphone as a UE, follow these steps:
smartphone.code:
adb install NetworkApp.apk
adb shell 'am start -n com.networkapp/.MainActivity'

pc.text: For a PC-based UE, ensure the network stack is set up as follows:
pc.code:
sudo apt update && sudo apt install network-tools
sudo systemctl enable networking

iot.text: To configure an IOT device as a UE, follow these steps:
iot.code:
adb install NetworkApp.apk
adb shell 'am start -n com.networkapp/.MainActivity'
